newsitem.title: UK: Ldn precious metals end higher after NY rally.
newsitem.headline: Ldn precious metals end higher after NY rally.

text.p: GOLD - Ends $3.05 higher at $343.65/$344.15 after New York-led fund buying. But hits resistance at $345.15.
SILVER - Rushes to a 10-cent higher finish at $4.83/$4.85 spurred by New York's technical move in quiet conditions.
PLATINUM - Pares gains but still $4.25 higher at $376.00/$377.00. Gains mostly attributed to Japanese buying.
PALLADIUM - Ends European session at $158.40/$159.40, up $2.90.
